alert.note: Alert for Gallatin Valley; Madison River Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 14 at 2:05PM MDT until March 16 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM WEDNESDAY TO 6 AM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Gallatin Valley and Madison River Valley. * WHEN...From 6 AM Wednesday to 6 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning and evening commutes. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A band of heavy snow will push through the area Wednesday morning, bringing a sudden reduction in visibility and rapid accumulations. This could cause the morning commute to be very difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
